label: ham
subject: Re: [R] Reducing the size of pdf graphics files produced with R
body: 42 (return) [ He praises the fidelity of Callixene, priestess of Ceres, who had been twice as constant as Penelope, and rewards her with the priesthood of the Phrygian goddess at Pessinus, (Julian. Epist. xxi.) He applauds the firmness of Sopater of Hierapolis, who had been repeatedly pressed by Constantius and Gallus to _apostatize_, (Epist. xxvii p. 401.)]
